file_content.text: [An elaborate script is carved into the stone. You scan it and let your datapad translate.]
I am Makna-Ha and I have caused war. Voss kill Voss. Thousands dead.
Only through war will Voss survive. Real war, not mock. Slaughter.
I have seen. It was interpreted. The Three declared. It must be.
I will spend eternity in tears.
